snippet: Mr. Kumalo used his journalism experience to become a chronicler of the cruelties of apartheid and South Africa’s eventual emergence as a biracial democracy.
abstract: Alf Kumalo, photographer who chronicled the cruelties of apartheid in South Africa, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kumalo used his journalism experience to become a chronicler of the cruelties of apartheid and South Africa’s eventual emergence as a biracial democracy.

headline.seo: Alf Kumalo, South African Photographer of Apartheid, Dies at 82
headline.main: Alf Kumalo, Whose Photography Indicted Apartheid, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Alf Kumalo, 82; Photographed Cruelties of Apartheid
